thread.section_title: Event Decor Direct Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Event Decor Direct | eventdecordirect.com
thread.title: Manaoloto Vaovasa
thread.title_full: Event Decor Direct reviewed by Manaoloto Vaovasa

author: Manaoloto Vaovasa
title: Manaoloto Vaovasa
text: I was ready and excited to purchase my item even though shipping cost almost the same price as the item, unfortunately, I receive an additional email right after I had provided my private and payment information, stating that I will be paying a little extra for my shipment!! I had called to ask for the reason of the additional payment because it was not stated in the billing statement, but I was told because the item is being shipped from ANOTHER warehouse!? I have not understanding on how the shipping process is but I do not believe that I should pay for the additional shipping of the item(s) from one warehouse to another warehouse etc.
